title: 1. Basics
content:
### Change HTML of Elements ```js document.body.innerHTML = "

This is now the heading of the body element

" ``` ### Return first Element ```js // Select First P Tag document.querySelector('p'); // Select First Li Tag and replace HTML document.querySelector('li').innerHTML=`Clickme` ``` ### Return Element by ID ```js // Select Element with ID "Fourth" document.getElementById("fourth").innerHTML = "Professor Snape"; ``` :::note The following selectors return a collection or Array ::: ### Return Elements by Class Name ```js // Select First Element with Class "Slytherin" document.getElementsByClassName("slytherin")[0].innerHTML = "Salazar Slytherin" ``` ### Return Elements by TAG Name ```js // Select First Element with TAG
  • document.getElementsByTagName("li")[0].innerHTML = "Dobby"; ```
